title: Task Tracker CLI
description: A CLI-based tool that to what you need to do, what you have done, and what you are currently working on.

title: 3x3 BLD Solution Generator CLI
description: A CLI-based 3x3 rubicks cube solution generator script that utilizes M2 algorithm for edges and Old Pochman algorithm for conrners.

title: Finance Tracker
description: An offline desktop-based application designed for students to monitor their daily spending habits, budget allocation, and overall financial health.

title: Help Desk Ticketing
description: A web-based ticketing system that allows users to report issues and help support teams track, manage, and resolve them efficiently.

title: Portfolio
description: An interactive website showcasing the projects I've built.

title: VIVID - Visually Intuitive and Interactive Datastructure
description: A web-based application designed to make learning data structures engaging and hands-on.
